sections.heading: Short title. This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Alzheimer's Disease Research, Care, and Support Fund Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Alzheimer's Disease Research, Care, and Support Fund Act.

sections.heading: Contributions on tax returns.  Each individual taxpayer required to file a return pursuant to the
sections.text:
Illinois Income Tax Act desiring to contribute to the Alzheimer's Disease Research, Care, and Support
Fund may do so by stating the amount of such contribution (not less than
$1) on such return. This Section shall not apply to an amended return.
